name: Angry Bull Fighter Simulator 3D
description:
Hit and demolish targets with strike of bull mighty horns. Rush the Bull through the arena, find mission targets and smash them in to pieces. In this extreme action game you’re steering a large bull, which is in a bad mood. The theme of the game is on an angry bull, which is in a bad mood steer the bull and smash boxes, barrels, bikes and people in the arena. Bull fighter simulator brings the next level of thrill and action.
You have two different modes to get in the arena. Free and challenging mode, the challenging mode has multiple extreme missions. Run behind the targets, jump over barriers and cause massive destruction. Angry bull fighter brings you the realistic graphics with multiple camera views to boost your gaming experience.
Features
• Ride the angry bull in 10 full of action missions.
• Free mode to ride the bull to explore the map.
• Challenge mode is to smash and complete missions in time.
• Multiple camera view to boost game play.
• Realistic controls and lifelike graphics.
